member.name: M:NewtonMethod.NumbersExtension.FindNthRoot(System.Double,System.Int32,System.Double)
member.summary: Implement an algorithm that allows you to calculate the root of the n-th power (n ∈ N) from a real number a using the Newton method with a given accuracy (] 0; epsilon [).
member.param: The real number from which the root is extracted.
member.returns: The root of the nth degree (n ∈ N) from a real number.
member.exception: Throw when power is negative or zero; accuracy is negative; even power root from a negative number.
